data.name: Visual Novel Maker - tentacles battle music
data.detailed_description:
Full-on EDM / dubstep assault! This ultra-modern DLC packs a serious punch! Ayato Sound Create brings you Tentacles Battle Music, featuring ultra-modern battle themes, with cutting edge elements of EDM and dubstep, this music pack brings a fresh new dimension and direction for your RPGMaker projects! Huge drum beats and full-out synth assaults, glitch-edits, bring something new to your battle scenes with super-up-to-date music production!

Features:

* 13 Royalty-free EDM / dubstep tracks for your game projects
* Can be used with Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice
* .OGG, .M4A, .MP3, Looping .OGG and .WAV formats included

Tracklist:

01 - Fear
02 - Stab
03 - Epic Break Down
04 - Middle Tempodub
05 - SK Breakdown
06 - M with AOK
07 - Tentacle Dance
08 - High Speed Attack
09 - Psychopass
10 - Hopless Voice
11 - Despair
12 - Erosion
13 - The End
